messages.title: Don't trust Theresa
messages.content: The Tories have U-turned on their pledge to scrap the hated ECHR. It currently stops us deporting criminals and even makes us pay them compensation.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To control immigration and reduce net migration.
Tories have U-turned on their pledge to scrap the hated ECHR.
To protect fishermen from future Brussels controls.
To strengthen national security undermined by cutting police by 20,000 officers.

issues.governance: Don't be fooled again by Theresa's Conservatives.
issues.health: Criticism of NHS care crisis under Conservative governance.
issues.immigration: Pledge to control immigration; criticism of high net migration figures under Conservative leadership.

images.caption: Graphical illustration of net migration to the UK from 2009 to 2016.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The message criticizes the Conservative government's record on various issues, including immigration and the NHS, and opposes Theresa May's approach.
